body: Ryu Karim is such a pethetic loser but he is still my fav. This was a frustrating read.  I've actually read it on a manga site, it's called Fox and Wolf.  But the hardest thing about this, is that each chapter reads as if translated by a different person.  There's no continuity.
This series can be found in English up to chapter 107, last I checked. I don't know why they don't update here anymore.
I really love this series soo far so ill consider moving
If you are interested in reading the rest, I suggest moving on to manga rock, they have 48 chapters out, and I'm currently waiting for the next chapter
There are alredy more chapters. Go to Heymanga.me to watch till chapter 34 (can already be more available). Seems like the author isn't going to upload more on nhentai. :(
"My only goal is to humiliate your body" that's hot af 😩💕
I'm too stupid, I don't understand what's going on
